name: Pinq Ponq
description:
Play with Your Friends Offline And Enjoy :)

There Are 3 Game Modes: Single, 2PLYR, 3PLYR.

You can Either Play With Your OFFLINE Friends or Alone.

 

All the information Regarding the Game has been added in Game's About Section.

(Use Alt+F4 To Quit)

Controls: 

Purple:      W to Move Up

                      S to Move Down

Red: UP arrow to Move Up

          DOWN arrow to Move Down

Yellow: J to Move Up

                 M to Move Down

Press M to Open up Main Menu

And P to Open Main Menu in 3PLYR Mod

A Game By Kasuga
